name: udemy-downloader-electron
description: Download your courses from Udemy website

scripts.start: npm run webpack | npm run watch
scripts.package-win: electron-packager . "Udemy Downloader" --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/build/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=dist --version-string.CompanyName=gcayetano --version-string.FileDescription="Download your courses from Udemy website" --version-string.ProductName="Udemy downloader"
scripts.package-win64: electron-packager . "Udemy Downloader" --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=assets/build/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=dist --version-string.CompanyName=gcayetano --version-string.FileDescription="Download your courses from Udemy website" --version-string.ProductName="Udemy downloader"

author: Gabriel Cayetano
